thread.title_full: Clean Republic Hill Topper Electric Bike Kit reviewed by Bruce Miller

author: Bruce Miller
title: Bruce Miller
text: I started researching e-bike conversion kits in Jun 2016. I learned about Clean Republic and I started saving my pennies. I have a DS 8.3 Trek bike, 24 speed. I purchased the 36v 350w model in early Feb 2017. I LOVE IT!!! Installation was simple, I had watched the youtube installation videos many times. I had talked with my bike shop and asked about the front fork. They had told me that I shouldn't have any problems. I really like the variable slide throttle. I've purchased a 150v dc meter to gauge the battery while I'm on the trails. I've had it out a few times and used it with both pedal assist and battery only. No problems. I would recommend this kit to anyone.
